class.name: RegulaFalsiSolverTest

javadoc.text: Test case for {@link RegulaFalsiSolver Regula Falsi} solver.

method.name: getQuinticEvalCounts
method.comment: While the Regula Falsi method guarantees convergence, convergence
may be extremely slow. The last test case does not converge within
even a million iterations. As such, it was disabled.
